statements: DELETE FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE item_name='Apple' AND quantity<=5;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='Sale' AND transaction_date<'2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND item_id = 200;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND price > 100
DELETE FROM shopping_cart WHERE user_id = 1 AND item_id = 3;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 100 AND transaction_date < '2021-10-01';
